name: Monograph
description:
I trained SD 1.5 on old monographs from different archives online. I trained it on peoples faces, buildings, animals and some medical diagrams of the human body as well. I used LORA to train it. I also generated these with deliberate model. In order to use, you must have the LORA extension installed in Automatic111. This works really well with other models that are trained on your face for example.

https://github.com/kohya-ss/sd-webui-additional-networks

modelVersions.name: Monograph ALT
modelVersions.description: This version of the model will give you more illustrated looks right out of the gate. This is the first version of the model I made, and the other one is a more refined, but I noticed I didn't get the same textures in that model so have fun with this one. It's just an alternative.

meta.prompt: <lora:monograph_v1:0.5> (a detailed drawing of a evil old Irish wizard in a robe with a long beard, portrait :1) , detailed, historic illustration, gothic, magic, hyperrealistic ,8k,europe,(creepy), white hair, old face, scary ,haunted demon <lora:monochrome :0.5> merlin
